General.Name: Flour Mills C. Sarantopoulos S.A.
General.Description: Flour Mills C. Sarantopoulos S.A. produces and sells flour and cereal in Greece. It offers bakery flour, luxury flour, durum wheat flour, and enhanced flour. The company also provides flour for puff pastry and buns. Flour Mills C. Sarantopoulos S.A. was founded in 1912 and is headquartered in Keratsini, Greece.
